original: Borgström, Elisabet Margareta Emelie (Millan), farm. kand., fru, Karlskrona, f. 22/4/90 i Ljusdal, Gäv-leb. 1., av major Jakob Gustaf Wid-mark o. Greta Bech. G. 1. 16 m. apot. Josef Filip Rydin, d. 23; 2. 24 m. apot. Ivar Borgström. — Studiex. i Östersund 09, farm. kand. 12. Elev v. apot. i Gudmundrå 09-11, anst. v. Gripen i Nyköp. 12-16, Hjorten i Östersund, i Smedjebacken 16-20, Tre Kronor i Karlskrona 20-23, åter i Smedjebacken, v. Göta Lejon i Karlskrona sed. 26. V. ordf. i Karlskrona farm :kl. 27-28 o. 31-34, ordf. 39-40, sekr. i Karlskrona RK-krets 29-45, led. av direkt. f. fören. f. und:stöd åt Pauvres honteux i Karlskrona 30, v. ordf. 35 o. ordf. sed. 42, ordf. i Karlskrona hus-mod: fören. 36-47, o^rdf. i Blek. husm:-förb. sed. 42, v. ordf. i dänsnyk-terh:ndn, led. av stadsfullm., kyrko-füllm. o. fattigv :styr. 39, v. ordf. sed. 46, v. ordf. i fam:bidr:ndn sed. 40. Föredr :håll. i soc. o. kult. ämnen. Skr.: utg. Widmarkskrönikan, organ f. Widm. släktfören. tills. m. G. W. Widmark sed. 30, art. i tidn. o. tidskr. SvRK förtjiSM.
translated: Borgström, Elisabet Margareta Emelie (Millan), farm. cand. (pharmacist), Mrs., from Karlskrona, born on April 22, 1890 in Ljusdal, Gävleborgs län, daughter of Major Jakob Gustaf Widmark and Greta Bech. Married twice: 1) for 16 months to pharmacist Josef Filip Rydin, who died in 1923; 2) for 24 months to pharmacist Ivar Borgström. Completed studies in Östersund in 1909 and obtained a degree as farm. cand. in 1912. Was an apprentice at a pharmacy in Gudmundrå from 1909-1911, employed at Gripen in Nyköping from 1912-1916, at Hjorten in Östersund, in Smedjebacken from 1916-1920, Tre Kronor in Karlskrona from 1920-1923, returned to Smedjebacken, was employed at Göta Lejon in Karlskrona since 1926. Served as vice chairman in the Karlskrona pharmacist association from 1927-1928 and 1931-1934, chairman in 1939-1940, secretary in the Karlskrona RK district from 1929-1945. Was a member of the management of the association for the support of Pauvres honteux in Karlskrona in 1930, vice chairman in 1935 and chairman since 1942, chairman of the Karlskrona housewives' association from 1936-1947, chairman of the Blekinge housewives' association since 1942, vice chairman of the dental association, member of the city council, church board and poor relief board since 1939, and vice chairman since 1946, vice chairman of the family aid committee since 1940. Has given lectures on social and cultural topics. Published the Widmark Chronicle, a publication of the Widmark family association with G.W. Widmark in 1930, and articles in magazines and journals of the Swedish pharmacist association.

structured.description: Elisabet Margareta Emelie Borgström was a pharmacist from Karlskrona, Sweden. She was born on April 22, 1890 in Ljusdal, Gävleborgs län, Sweden, to Major Jakob Gustaf Widmark and Greta Bech. She completed studies in Östersund in 1909 and obtained a degree as a pharmacist in 1912. Borgström was employed at various pharmacies throughout her career, including Gripen in Nyköping, Hjorten in Östersund, and Smedjebacken. She was also a member of several professional and charitable organizations in Karlskrona, including the pharmacist association, the housewives' association, and the association for the support of Pauvres honteux. She passed away on an unknown date.
